maqras.text: 17|99|cheonjileul changjohasin hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul dasi changjohal su iss-eulila saeng-gagji moshaneunyo geudeul-ege hanjeongdoen gihan-eul jun geos-eun uisimhal ba eobsnola geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geoyeoghago bulsin hal ppun-ideola
17|100|illeogalodoe neohuiga hananim ui bomul-eul soyuhanda hayeodo geugeos-igogaldoelkka dulyeowo sayonghaji ani hani sillo ingan-eun insaeghal ppun-ila

17|101|hananim-eun moseege myeongbaeghan aheubgajiui yejeung-eul jueossnani i seula-el jason-ege mul-eula geuga geu deul-ege ileuleoss-eul ttae palaoga geu ege malhayeossdeola moseyeo naneun geu daega masul-e geollyeo issdago saeng-gagha nila
17|102|mose ileudoe haneulgwa daejiuijunimkkeseo myeongbaeghan yejeung-eulo gyesihan igeosdeul-eul dangsin-eun algo issnani pa laoyeo dangsin-eun sillo myeolmanghal geos-i la saeng-gagdoebnida
17|103|geuneun geudeul-eul geu ttang-eulobu teo chubanghalyeo hayeoss-euna hananim-eun geuwa geuligo geuleul ttaleuneun moduleul igsake hayeossnola
17|104|geuleon hu hananim-eun iseula-eljason-ege geu ttang-e geojuhala hayeoss euna naese-ui yagsog-i ileul ttae hana nim-eun neohui moduleul dwiseokk-in gunjung-eu lo moige halila
17|105|jinliloseo hananim-eun igeos-eul gyesihaessnani jinlilosseo geugeos-i wassno la hananim-i geudaeleul bonaem-eun bog-eum eul jeondalhago gyeong-gohadolog ham-ila
17|106|hananim-i kkulan-eul bubunjeog-eu lo gyesiham-eun geudaega baegseongdeul-ege jeomchajeog-eulo nangsonghayeo judolog hagi wihae hananim-eun geugeos-eul dangyejeog-eulo gyesihayeossnola
17|107|illeogalodoe neohuiga geugeos-eul middeon ttoneun midji ani hadeolado geu ijeon-e jisig-i iss-eossdeon jadeul-eun geu geos-i nangsongdoel ttae buboghago gyeongbaeha deola
17|108|juyeo yeong-gwang-eul bad-eusoseo sillojunim-ui yagsog-i wanseongdoeliyo
17|109|geuligo geudeul-eun eopdeulyeo heuneukkini geudeul-ui gyeomsonham-i deohayeo ji deola

17|110|illeogalodoe jabilousin ha nanimkke guwonhala neohuiga museun i leum-eulo hananim-eul buleudeon hananim-ui ileum-eun gajang aleumdaunila geudae ga yebaehal ttae solileul nop-iji maldoeneomu najchueodo anidoemyeo geu sai ui jung-gan-eul taeghala q

17|111|illeogalodoe hananimkke modeun-yeong-gwang-eul deulila geubun-eun jasondo eobs eumyeo geubun-ui dongbanjado eobsnola geu bun-eun ttohan eotteon bohojado pil-yochi ani hasini geubun-ui widaehamgwa yeong gwang-eul chanmihala
18|1|geubun-ui jong-ege seongseoleul gyesihanhananimkke chanmileul deulinani geuan eneun iljeong-ui waegogdoemdo eobsnola
18|2|geugeos-eun eulbaleun jinlilo iloha yeo museoun beol-eul gyeong-gohago mid-eum-eu lo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-ege joh-eun bo sang-i geudeul-ui geos-ilaneun bog-eum-eul jeon hanola
18|3|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo yeong-wonhi meomu nola
18|4|hananimkkeseo adeul-eul dusyeossda malhaneun ideul-egedo gyeong-gohanola
18|5|geudeul-egeneun geue daehan jisig-ieobsgo geudeul-ui seonjodeuldo geuleohaess-euni geudeul-ui ib-eseo naoneun mal-eun seulpeu gedo geojis-inola
18|6|amado geudaeneun geudeul-i malsseum-eulmidji aniham-eulo malmiam-a goeloulttaega iss-eulila
18|7|sillo hananim-eun daejiwiui modeungeos-eul jangsig-eulo dueoss-eul ppun ineun geudeul gaunde eoneu geos-i gajang hullyunghan galeul siheomkoja ham-ila
18|8|hananim-eun geu wie issneun modeun geos-eul hwangpehan heulg-eulo mandeul geos-ila
18|9|dong-gul-ui baegseongdeulgwa geu gilog-e gwanhan geos-eul isanghi saeng-gaghaneunyo geu geos-eun hananim-ui nollaun yejeung-gaundehanala
18|10|bola jeolm-eun-ideul-i dong-gullo eun sinhayeo malhagil juyeo jeohuiege dang sin-ui jabileul bepul-eo jusoseo geuli go jeohuiga haneun il-eul olbaleun gillo indohayeo jusoseo lago hayeossdeola
18|11|hananim-eun geudeul-i deudji ani hadolog hayeo sunyeongan geugos-e issge hanola
18|12|geuleonhu hananim-eun geudeul-eul jam eseo ilkkaewoss-euni ineun du mulijung eoneu muliga geudeul-i jichehan sunyeon gan-e daehan gyesan-e uwolhanji algi wiham-ila
18|13|hananim-i geudaeege jinliloseogeudeul-ui iyagileul jeonhanola geudeul eun mid-eum-eul gajin jeolm-eun-ideul-ieoss-euni geudeul-ege eunhyeleul deohayeo jueossnola

18|14|hananim-i geudeul-ui ma-eum-eul gang hage hayeoss-euni geudeul-i il-eona malhadeola uliui junim-eun cheonjiui junim-isini ulineun gyeolko geubun oe e daleun sin-eul seomgiji anh-eulila u liga geulaessdamyeon ulineun sillo gwajang doen mal-eul jikkeolyeoss-eul ppun-ila

18|15|geuleonde i go-eul-ui baegseongdeul-eun geubun ioeui daleun sin-eul seomgyeossdeola geuleonde wae geudeul-eun bunmyeonghan yejeung-eul daeji moshaneunyo hananim-e daehayeo geojishaneun jaboda deo saaghan jaga nugu-inyo

18|16|neohuiga hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehaneun geudeul-eul meonlihalyeo han damyeon dong-gullo gala junimkkeseo neohui ege jabileul bepul geos-imyeo neohuiui il-i pyeong-anhago swibdolog hayeo juli la
